articles.description: Coronavirus (Covid-19) vaccine: Pfizer and BioNTech are currently accumulating this additional safety data and estimate that it will take until the third week of November for the company to make available two months’ worth of safety data
articles.content:

articles.title: Assessing Singapore's digital bank licence bids - The Ken
articles.description: Singapore will have five digital bank licensees by this year. We assessed all 14 applicants based on the criteria laid out. There are some clear favourites
